preferences.name: extensions.comicrocket.timeout
preferences.title: Timeout
preferences.description: length of time to wait before checking for new feeds (minutes)

preferences.name: extensions.comicrocket.hidden
preferences.title: Hidden comics
preferences.description: List of comics which are not shown on the add-on. Remove a comic from this list to have it shown. Note: this must be a comma followed by a space or else it won't work.
